newsitem.title: USA: Computer Associates sees Q4 EPS at $0.90/shr.
newsitem.headline: Computer Associates sees Q4 EPS at $0.90/shr.

text.p: Computer Associates International Inc said Wednesday that it expects to report 1997 fourth quarter earnings per share at $0.90 on revenues of $1.2 billion versus $0.70 on revenues of $1.1 billion last year.
Analysts estimate Computer Associates' fourth quarter earnings to be $0.86 per share, according to First Call.
Computer Associates said it sees earnings per share for the fiscal year ending March 31 at $2.54 on revenues of $4 billion compared with year-ago earnings of $1.99 on $3.5 billion.
First Call says analysts estimate the firm's full year results will be $2.51 per share.

The company said its 1997 full fiscal year results exclude the effect of the $598 million research and development charge, taken in the third fiscal quarter, in conjunction with Computer Associates' acquisition of Cheyenne Software Inc.
The company said it expects to report final audited financial results for the quarter and year at the end of May 1997.
